meaning_str.bing:
n. 烤箱；烤炉
网络. 烘箱；焗炉；炉灶

烤箱；烤炉；烘箱；烘炉；窑炉；熔炉；火化炉；微波炉；烘焙设备；烹饪设备

0.en: After about 90 minutes of proving, it's set for the oven.
0.cn: 90分钟的发酵之后，可以放到烤箱了。

1.en: Now ,that will go into an oven at 220 for about 25 minutes.
1.cn: 现在放进烤箱中，温度要220度，大约烘烤25分钟。

2.en: Ok, but get the potatoes in the oven, the others will be here soon.
2.cn: 好的，但是把土豆放到烤箱里吧，其他人很快就会到了。

3.en: After a second prove, it needs about 30 minutes in an oven at 220 degrees.
3.cn: 接下来是第二次醒面，放在220度的烤箱里30分钟。

4.en: You get a huge amount of satisfaction seeing a loaf coming out of the oven that you've made.
4.cn: 当你看到从烤箱里做好的面包时，有一种巨大的满足感。

5.en: Hey, did you guys know, that your oven doesn't work? But the drawer full of take-out menus is okay, right?
5.cn: 你知道你的烤箱坏了吗？装满外送菜单的抽屉，没坏吧？

6.en: Tina, if you could pop this into the oven for me. 180 for about 30 minutes, that would be great.
6.cn: 蒂娜，麻烦你帮我把这个放进烤箱，180摄氏度烤30分钟就好。

7.en: All right, I'm out of oven space. I'm gonna turn on Joey's. Please, watch him. Do not let Joey eat any of the food.
7.cn: 我要借用乔伊的烤箱，拜托看好他，别让乔伊偷吃东西。

8.en: To get a great crust on this loaf, a professional baking secret is to fill a trough in the bottom of the oven with water.
8.cn: 为了让面包很脆，一个很专业的秘诀是把烤箱下面的水槽里倒满水。

9.en: Then score the loaf, which allows you to control the direction in which the loaf expands, or blooms, in the oven. Thus the name bloomer.
9.cn: 然后用刀子在面包上划几刀，这会让你控制面包在烤箱中膨胀的方向，因此才得名。

10.en: Now we just have to bake it in the oven. Mummy, can I lick the spoon? Yes, you can lick the spoon and George can lick the bowl. Yippee.
10.cn: 最后把它放进烤箱里烤。我能舔舔勺子吗？当然你可以来舔舔勺子，让乔治来舔碗好了。

11.en: Now we just have to bake it in the oven. Mummy, can I lick the spoon? Yes, you can lick the spoon and George can lick the bowl. Yippee.
11.cn: 最后把它放进烤箱里烤。我能舔舔勺子吗？当然你可以来舔舔勺子，让乔治来舔碗好了。

12.en: Now we need to bake the tea-set in a kiln. A kiln is an oven, cooks the clay and makes it hard. The teaset should be ready. Hooray.
12.cn: 现在我们要把茶具放在炉窑里烘干。炉窑就好像是一个烤箱，他会烘干黏土，让黏土变硬。现在茶具应该干了。太棒了。

13.en: Okay. But get the potatoes in the oven, the others will be here soon. We've plenty of time. It's only eleven o'clock. Peppa and her family are on their way.
13.cn: 好吧把土豆放进烤箱里吧。他们一会儿就到，我们有的是时间，现在才十一点。佩奇一家人已经在路上了。

14.en: Cover in foil and into the oven for half an hour on a low heat, about 100 degrees centigrade, and after 30 minutes, out they come with the Chinese cabbage beautifully wilted, the stock infused and the lion head meatballs fit for an emperor.
14.cn: 盖上锡纸，放入烤箱，低温大约100摄氏度烤半小时，30分钟后，皇帝的御膳，狮子头，佐以吸收了鲜美汤汁的大白菜，就大功告成了。

15.en: I mean this has been like my dream since I got my first Easy Bake Oven and opened Easy Monica's Bakery.
15.cn: 从我拥有简易烘烤箱，开了“简易莫妮卡”糕饼店起，就在梦想这一天。

16.en: Did nobody notice the oven light? Lights mean things, people!
16.cn: 没人看见烤炉亮着灯吗？同志们？指示灯是有意义的！

17.en: And don't tell my hips, but I'm warming up a brie in the oven.
17.cn: 别告诉我的屁股，但烤炉里还热着干酪。

18.en: Fresh cookies. Hot from the oven. Oh. Please, have some. Oh, yumm.
18.cn: 热腾腾的饼干，刚出炉的请用。

19.en: No, no, no, no, no. I smell smoke. Well, I didn't turn the oven on yet. Did you? No.
19.cn: 不，不，不，是烟味。我还没开烤炉呢，你开了吗？还没。
